availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James E. Harvey (Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, newspaper columnist)

body.p: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, newspaper columnist. South Carolina native. Newspaper columnist for the Philadelphia North American and United States Gazette in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania c1861.

ab.bibl:
Daniel W. Crofts, Reluctant Confederates: Upper South Unionists in the Secession Crisis (Chapel Hill: The University of North Carolina Press, 1989), 220, 237, 418.
Daniel W. Crofts, “James E. Harvey and the Secession Crisis,” Pennsylvania Magazine of History and Biography 103 (April 1979), 177-184, 193-195.
